The Eiffel editor allows you to edit and manage multiple Eiffel
../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/index.xml classes classes from within Visual Studio .NET.

EiffelEnvision's Eiffel editor is specifically designed to edit Eiffel ../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlclasses using Visual Studio .NET. The Eiffel editor integrates directly into the Visual Studio .NET vxurfCodeTextEditorWindow 0 Core Editor and provides all of the editor services and features you would come to expect from a language editor in Visual Studio .NET.
